name: Dusk Diver 酉閃町
summary: Dusk Diver is an anime style beat-em-up action game. You will be playing as Yumo, an ordinary high school girl, to fight with the Guardians against those Phantoms who dare to enter the realm of men.
info:
• 开发: JFi Games
  • 发行: JFi Games
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2019年3月26日 (Early Access), 2019年10月23日 (正式发行)
  • 官方网站: https://duskdiver.jfigames.com/index.html
